name: Mystina
notes: Please Install default Location on Game Installer

task.description: Installing CJK Fonts for proper Asian font display
task.name: winetricks

task.description:
Installing Mystina...
PLEASE close the game after it opens to finish installation!
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- installer: http://files.lager.com.tw/mo/Mystina_20110530.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Lager/Mystina/login.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting up wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: cjkfonts
    arch: win32
    description: Installing CJK Fonts for proper Asian font display
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Lager/Mystina/
    src: installer
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: 'Installing Mystina...

      PLEASE close the game after it opens to finish installation!'
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Lager/Mystina/Mystina_20110530.exe
    name: wineexec
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
